# KJ Dutaro Portfolio Documentation

> KJ Dutaro (Kristee Joy Dutaro) - Frontend Web Developer specializing in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Mapbox integration, and WordPress themes. Built 60+ responsive websites with focus on UI/UX and performance optimization. Remote developer based in Philippines available for hire.

> KJ Dutaro (Kristee Joy Dutaro) - Frontend Web Developer specializing in JavaScript, React, and modern web technologies.
> Built 60+ responsive websites with Mapbox integration and custom WordPress themes.
> Focus on UI/UX, performance optimization, and technical SEO.
> Remote developer based in Philippines available for hire.

## About

Kristee Joy Dutaro is a Frontend Web Developer specializing in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern web technologies. Built and deployed 60+ responsive websites featuring interactive Mapbox maps and custom WordPress themes, with a focus on UI/UX, performance optimization, and technical SEO. Developed 4 Chrome extensions and converted 9+ static templates into custom WordPress themes. Expertise in frontend development, responsive design, and delivering maintainable, user-focused web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Next.js.

## Technical Skills

Technical skills are structured in the main profile data:
- Languages: JavaScript, Python, Java, PHP, TypeScript  
- Frameworks: React, Next.js, Astro
- Tools: Git/GitHub, VS Code, Cursor IDE, Figma, Firebase, Cloudflare, Vercel, Tailwind CSS
- Specializations: Static Site Generation, WordPress Theme Development, Multi-language Localization, Blog Content Generation, Mapbox Integration, Responsive Design
- See profile data for complete skill breakdown

## Key Projects

- **Tours, Tickets & Hiking Sites** (May 2025 - Present): Built and deployed 30+ touring microsites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with integrated map APIs. Improved load times by ~20% and search visibility.
- **Google Chrome Extensions** (Oct 2024 - Dec 2024): Developed and maintained 6 Chrome extensions using JavaScript and Chrome Extensions API.
- **WordPress Theme Conversion** (Jan 2025 - Apr 2025): Converted 5+ static HTML templates into dynamic WordPress themes.
- **Timesheet Management Web App** (Jun 2024 - Aug 2024): Designed and built MVP timesheet system for ~50 employees using Bubble.io.

## Experience

- **Freelance Frontend/Web Developer** (May 2025 - Present): Building touring and location-based microsites with Mapbox integration
- **Freelance WordPress Custom Theme Developer** (Jan 2025 - Apr 2025): Custom WordPress theme development using PHP, HTML, CSS, and ACF
- **Freelance Chrome Extension Developer** (Oct 2024 - Dec 2024): UI fixes and feature enhancements for Chrome extensions
- **Web Developer Intern at Jairosoft Inc.** (Jun 2024 - Aug 2024): Internal timesheet management system frontend development

## Education

## Services

Web development services are defined in profile data:
- Web Development: Static sites and dynamic apps with Astro, React, Next.js
- WordPress Themes: Custom themes from Figma, theme customization, plugin work
- Maintenance: Updates, security, performance, ongoing improvement
- Blog & Content: AI-assisted blog content, SEO, content strategy
- Localization: Multi-language translation and localization
- Mapbox: Interactive maps, tour guides, location-based features
- See profile.services for complete service descriptions

## Technologies Used on This Site

- **Framework**: Astro (static site generation)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens
- **Icons**: Lucide Astro
- **Fonts**: JetBrains Mono, Source Sans 3
- **Design**: Terminal/developer aesthetic with dark mode
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages / Vercel

## Availability

Open to freelance projects and full-time remote opportunities.
Specializing in frontend development, React applications, Chrome extensions, and touring/travel websites.
